projects.title: NoteTaker
projects.description: Full-stack mobile OCR platform that digitizes handwritten notes. Uses an OpenCV pipeline for image preprocessing and Microsoft TrOCR to transcribe cursive text with 94% accuracy, fully indexed for search via PostgreSQL.

projects.title: UNC Macro Tracker
projects.description: Native iOS application enabling real-time nutritional tracking for university dining. Reverse-engineered internal AJAX APIs to scrape live menu data and implemented a client-side caching layer using SwiftUI and MVVM.
